Title: A Modern Turkish Poet: Fine-Tuned GPT-2
Abstract: generative tasks are getting more realistic thanks to the improvements in deep learning. text generation is getting increasingly important as llms  large language models  get more advanced. even though chatgpt gave rise to many computer generated literary works it has several limitations such as not being open sourced and can't be fine tuned. because other llms are understudied in turkish they usually can't be used efficiently to generate literary work. in this paper we fine tuned gpt-2  models on sixty turkish poem categories and trained five models that convey different emotions and write on different topics. the results are gathered in a 70 page turkish poem book named ‚äúger√ßekligin ƒ∞√ßinde‚äù that contains 50 poems in total 10 poems for each chapter. the book got published by amazon  goodreads  and google books .
